traits.name: Illumination
entries: While it has at least 1 hit point, the astral blight sheds dim light in a 10-foot radius.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
entries: The blight doesn't require air or sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The blight makes two Heat-Draining Vine attacks.

actions.name: Heat-Draining Vine
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3 damage) radiant damage, and if the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 13). Until this grapple ends, the target takes 3 (1d6 damage) cold damage at the start of each of its turns. The blight has two vines, each of which can grapple one creature.
